Boost Your Focus. Nurture Your Plants.

Stay productive and stay green with the LetPlant GreenFocus Pomodoro Timer – a smart, nature-inspired productivity tool that helps you manage your time while taking care of your plants! Whether you're working, studying, or just trying to stay on track with tasks, this innovative Pomodoro timer is designed to keep you focused, refreshed, and in tune with nature.

Why GreenFocus?
The LetPlant GreenFocus Pomodoro Timer isn’t just about staying productive—it's about staying connected to nature. As you work, you’ll see your virtual plant growing, a visual reward that motivates you to complete tasks and take meaningful breaks. The app promotes productivity, mental wellness, and eco-consciousness all in one.


Key Features:
Pomodoro Timer: Based on the famous Pomodoro technique, work for 25 minutes, then take a 5-minute break. After four sessions, enjoy a longer break to recharge.


Plant Care Integration: During your breaks, enjoy visual plant growth updates, plant care tips, and the option to check on your virtual plant’s health.
Eco-Friendly Focus: Stay motivated to complete tasks by nurturing a digital plant that grows as you work. Each task completed brings your plant closer to blooming!

Customizable Timings: Adjust the work and break intervals to suit your productivity needs.

Simple, Clean Design: A minimalist interface that blends seamlessly into your browser, helping you focus without distraction.


Transform your productivity routine into a greener, more mindful experience with LetPlant GreenFocus Pomodoro Timer.

Get started now and watch your plants grow as you do!
